attributes.action: Remove all arbitary tax and other benefits given to religious organisations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Religious organisations are no more than basic businesses in disguise and should be treated as such.  All should be fully taxable including subject to local tax.  Religious organisations should have no priorities, control nor affect on any government legislation. Religion is a lifestyle choice, in the same way as you choose the brand of your next pair of jeans, and religious organisations should have no more control, influence or importance over government affairs than that given to any other commercial business.
